(Yes, Battera is on the CybertronFire)


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Battera::
> 
> She rolled onto her side and gasped in pain.  She cried.  She 
coun't 
> really move at all.  The wound sent waves of pain through her 
body.  
> She cried and whispered, "CYbershark,   I love you." She closed her 
> eyes and passed out, laying on her side, in a growing puddle of 
mech 
> fluid.
> 
> 
>

> > ::CyberShark/Dark Prime::
> > 
> >     CyberShark's normaly blue eyes went to a crimson Red. His 
hand 
> blade started to spin and he went after Dark Prime. Prime moved 
> quicker than CyberShark and his sword came down inbetween the 
blades 
> of CyberShark's hand. CyberShark pulled out his gun and fired two 
> missles at Prime. Prime was hit, he got up, leaking mech fluid and 
> ran off.
> >     "If she dies, I will hunt you to the ends of the Earth!" 
> CyberShark roared after him. He picked up Battera and rushed her 
into 
> the CF, looking for a CR Chamber.
> >     "Where are the CR Chambers in this slagging ship?!"

maximal..."
